title: ISS CTF 2025 - Crypto SOS Writeup
preview: A detailed writeup of the Crypto SOS challenge from the ISS CTF 2025, covering the steps taken to decode the message and retrieve the flag.
author: Nick McClure

title: My First Reported Vulnerability - Fake WordPress Plugin
preview: A story about how I discovered and reported my first security vulnerability while I was learning how to use the tool 'WPScan'.
author: Nick McClure

title: ISS News - November 20, 2025 - Browser-in-the-Browser Attack
preview: An overview of the Browser-In-The-Browser (BitB) attack news story that I covered for the News segment at ISS this week.
author: Nick McClure

title: CyberSci CTF 2025 - Warmup They Didn't Listen Writeup
preview: A writeup of the warmup challenge 'They Didn't Listen' from the CyberSci CTF 2025, detailing the approach and solution used to solve the challenge to retreive the flag.
author: Nick McClure

title: ISS News - December 4, 2025 - ShadyPanda Malware Campaign
preview: An overview of the ShadyPanda malware campaign news story that I covered for the News segment at ISS this week.
author: Nick McClure

title: How I Traced a Russian Scammer from a Phishing Email To Their Real Identity
preview: A story about how I went from looking into an interesting phishing email from a peer to finding the real identity of the Russian scammer behind this attempt, and everything I learned throughout this process.
author: Nick McClure
